book.synopsis: Investigative reporter Spider Jerusalem attacks the injustices of the 23rd Century surroundings while working for the newspaper The Word in this critically-acclaimed graphic novel series written by comics superstar Warren Ellis, the co-creator of PLANETARY and THE AUTHORITY.
book.title_long: Transmetropolitan VOL 04: The New Scum (Transmetropolitan (Graphic Novels))
book.dimensions: Height: 10 Inches, Length: 6.5 Inches, Weight: 0.45 Pounds, Width: 0.25 Inches
